text: She refused death however, for Megerein was as iron. Her name alone carried the tale of blood. #RPG ~Gallery of Souls, Aufstrag
At the end of each (chain) was a long, thin, metal, barded hook. These barbed hooks were called Unklar's Love. ~Gallery, Aufstrag
Others still are splattered with blood and feces, expressions of minds utterly unhinged ~Gallery of Souls, Aufstrg
Scribbles of the mad and damned line some of the rooms, as some houseless memory found expression upon the walls of hell ~ Gallery, Aufstrag
Many of the rooms bare scratches where fingers dug into the bricking until nails were broken and blood stained the ruins. ~Gallery, Aufstrag
The Stone-brow is over 2000 feet high, to fall down it is to die. ~ Gallery of Souls, Aufstrag,
The Gallery became a nightmare of the damned, for most were forgotten in the dark, dank cells and died in madness and despair ~ Aufstrag
